HELP US MAKE THE FORUM A CARBON NEUTRAL EVENT

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”justified” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”] Help us to offset the carbon emissions of the Forum! Thanks to EcoAct, we can make the Forum a carbon neutral event. Help us by answaring our online survey! [/et_pb_text][et_pb_button admin_label=”Bouton” button_url=”https://fr.surveymonkey.com/r/NRJ9YQJ” url_new_window=”off” button_text=”Answer the survey” button_alignment=”center” background_layout=”light” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#313f55″ button_border_color=”#313f55″ button_letter_spacing=”0″ button_use_icon=”default” button_icon_placement=”right” button_on_hover=”on” button_letter_spacing_hover=”0″] [/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section admin_label=”Section” fullwidth=”off” specialty=”off” transparent_background=”off” background_color=”#313f55″ allow_player_pause=”off” inner_shadow=”off” parallax=”off” parallax_method=”off” padding_mobile=”off” make_fullwidth=”off” use_custom_width=”off” width_unit=”on” make_equal=”off” use_custom_gutter=”off”][et_pb_row admin_label=”row”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”dark” text_orientation=”center” text_font_size=”20″ use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

ALREADY IN PARIS: USE ENVIRONMENT FRIENDLY TRANSPORTATION

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section admin_label=”section”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Ligne”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”justified” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

If you are joining us from anywhere within the Paris region, think of using Cityscoot!  Thousand of electric scooters await and the first 20 minutes are for free with the discount code CONVERGENCES. No subscription needed.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”row”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

0g of CO2/km

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image admin_label=”Image” src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/front-car-1.png” show_in_lightbox=”off” url=”https://www.consoglobe.com/les-14-modes-de-transport-les-moins-polluants-cg” url_new_window=”off” use_overlay=”off” animation=”off” sticky=”off” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”off” always_center_on_mobile=”on” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”] [/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”left” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image admin_label=”Image” src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/subway-sign-2.png” show_in_lightbox=”off” url_new_window=”off” use_overlay=”off” animation=”off” sticky=”off” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”off” always_center_on_mobile=”on” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”] [/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

BY RER

RER B

Station Chatelet les Halles from the airport Charles de Gaulle and the airport Orly.

See the map.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

111.8g of CO2/km

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image admin_label=”Image” src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/bus-2.png” show_in_lightbox=”off” url_new_window=”off” use_overlay=”off” animation=”off” sticky=”off” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”off” always_center_on_mobile=”on” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”] [/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

BY BUS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”justified” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Air France shuttle every 30 minutes from 6 AM to 10 PM

Charles de Gaulle airport Lines 2 and 4 Orly airport Line 1

More information here

 

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

221.45g of CO2/km

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image admin_label=”Image” src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/front-car-2.png” show_in_lightbox=”off” url_new_window=”off” use_overlay=”off” animation=”off” sticky=”off” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”off” always_center_on_mobile=”on” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”] [/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

BY CAR

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”justified” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

One unique phone number decided by Paris city office: 01 45 30 30 30

Or Alpha Taxi, G7 Taxis, Taxis Bleus

You can find a  option green option for your taxi.

 

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section admin_label=”section” transparent_background=”off” background_color=”#313f55″ allow_player_pause=”off” inner_shadow=”off” parallax=”off” parallax_method=”off” padding_mobile=”off” make_fullwidth=”off” use_custom_width=”off” width_unit=”on” make_equal=”off” use_custom_gutter=”off”][et_pb_row admin_label=”row”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”dark” text_orientation=”center” text_font_size=”20″ use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

TRAIN OR PLANE?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section admin_label=”Section” fullwidth=”off” specialty=”off”][et_pb_row admin_label=”Ligne”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”justified” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Every year, the vast majority of Convergences World Forum carbon emissions are due to plane flights. On average, a plane emits 360 grams CO2 equivalent per kilometer when a car emits 150 grams CO2 equivalent for the same distance and a train 11 grams CO2 equivalent. Looking at the gap between these number, it is a necessity to think about which means of transportation is the most suitable for our trips.

Some advice if you are traveling to Paris from a far place to attend Convergences World Forum:

 

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Ligne”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″][et_pb_image admin_label=”Image” src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/train-on-railroad-1.png” show_in_lightbox=”off” url_new_window=”off” use_overlay=”off” animation=”off” sticky=”off” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”off” always_center_on_mobile=”on” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”] [/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”justified” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

For trips with a distance inferior to 1000 km, we advice to opt for the train rather than the plane. It is an economical and quite rapid mean of transportation.

 

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″][et_pb_image admin_label=”Image” src=”https://www.convergences.org/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/airplane-shape-1.png” show_in_lightbox=”off” url_new_window=”off” use_overlay=”off” animation=”off” sticky=”off” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”off” always_center_on_mobile=”on” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”] [/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Texte” background_layout=”light” text_orientation=”justified” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

For long distance trips by flight, it is possible to reduce the environmental impact by choosing the economical class rather than the first class (emitting the most) or the business class.

 

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
